app.title: Barbar Feast 2021 - THREE DAYS OF TRUE ESTONIAN HEAT

content.slogan: Three days of true Estonian heat
content.construction: Please remain patient, we're currently working on this page

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Where does the festival take place?
faq.a1: Barbar Feast 2021 will be held in picturesque Viking Village, only half an hour drive from Tallinn.
faq.a2:
For those who come by car or motorcycle, the map above has a link for directions (click on the red pin) - the destination is Viikingite k√ºla, Saula, 75117 Harju maakond. You'll also find information about the parking lots above. ‚¨Ü

There will also be a Festival Bus (named "Hop On Fuck Off") departing from in front of Rockclub Barbar (R√§vala pst 8, 10145 Tallinn). Find more info about the bus right above! ‚¨Ü
faq.a3: While the Viking Village offers all kinds of experiential accommodation all year round, all spots have been filled for now. Nevertheless we welcome you to our camping grounds free of charge (price included in the festival pass).
faq.q4: Can I enter with my own drink?
faq.a4: Nope BUT we have a Festival Shop in the tenting area with good prices
faq.q5: Can I pay for stuff with card?
faq.a5: Absolutely! Still we advise you to have some cash on you aswell (bandmerch, Festival Market stuff and other stuff all in cash + electricity might go out...)
faq.a6: As long as it's not against the rules of the Vikings Village, the Constitution of the Republic of Estonia and does not violate or harm the health, property or well-being of the people and animals around you, you can. However, if there is anything crazy on your mind, please let us know well in advance.

location.desc: BARBAR FEAST 2021 will be held in picturesque Viking Village, only half an hour drive from Tallinn. Three days of this rockin' festival will bring you 30 best of the best local rock & metal acts, 2 stages (one in a wooden fort (!) the other next to a primal river), chillin' in the tenting area, refreshing swims, endless parties at the festival market area and many other grand activites + SUMMER, FRIENDS, LIVE MUSIC /../. YES PLEASE!

booking.desc2: The email Subject should be: HOFO; include the following in the email:
booking.name: - passenger(s) full name
booking.date: - on which date you wish to travel

parking.title: Where can I park my vehicle?
parking.desc:
Here's a map with the three nearest parking lots to the festival grounds:

TSIKLIPARKLA - Motorcycle parking lot (FREE)
PARKLA 24/7 VALVE - Parking lot with 24/7 surveillance (PAID)
VALVETA PARKLA - Parking lot without any surveillance (FREE)

PEASISSEP√Ñ√ÑS - The main entrance to the grounds

For precise information about parking and it's cost (for the 24/7 surveillance lot) visit the ticket sales tent at the main entrance of the festival grounds

footer.msg: Barbar Feast is brought to you by rock club Barbar!

bands.1: Legendary Estonian party punk rock band
bands.2: Estonia's top notch Folk Metal flagship
bands.3: Brutal vocals, tight beat, death & gore - that is Goresoerd
bands.4: Heavy metal wakes the beast (& the beast inside you)
bands.6: Forefathers of Estonian metal celebrating their 40th jubilee
bands.7: Psykhopaths laying down some seriously good death metal with crushing female vocals
bands.8: Massive riffs, pedal to the metal 'n heavy vocals are what will make you come... near the stage
bands.9: High energy rock 'n' roll from Tallinn, Estonia
bands.10: Let's take a thrash metal cruise with a lil of death 'n a lil of groove
bands.11: Legendary rockabilly crowd pleaser. Come & get some!
bands.13: Get your Estonian dose of Devin Townsend, Mastodon, Gojira & LOG
bands.14: Technical stoner rock caress from Estonia
bands.15: Clean female vocals flirt with extreme male vocals carried by modern metal and melodic guitar solos
bands.17: An Estonian 5-piece balances a love affair between melodic rock and stoner roughhousing
bands.18: Metal cowboys from deep south of Estonia
bands.19: War demon S√ºngehel brings black metal rite to the barbarians
bands.20: Mix black and heavy metal with folklore & mythology
bands.22: Something hard, rockish, sexy & all of that also on stage... 100%
bands.23: The best hard rock in the world seen through the eyes of Coverage
bands.24: 4 horsemen of death hitting their instruments hard, bringing fourth the best of the best by Metallica
bands.25: Dark & hypnotizing, dynamic & absorbing primal power
bands.26: Fast and hairy! This is Riser, an old school thrash and heavy metal band
bands.27: Timeless sounding black metal with beautiful female vocals
bands.28: If you're into old school metal, DJ Taat's your DJ devil!
bands.29: This man doesn't leave any stone unturned! His thought-through program is considerate of every rock & metal melomaniac's wishful thoughts & vibes in devilish ways
bands.30: Revisit 80's & 90's rock & metal hits! Best party vibe guaranteed!

program.start: Start of the first day in Vikings Village

info.desc:
BARBAR FEAST is not only about heavy music, it‚Äôs also about having a LOT of fun!
Here are a few of the things going on at the festival grounds to make this weekend even more memorable for you:
info.axe: GET SOME AXETION - practice axe throwing & archery
info.splash: REFRESH YOURSELF - there is a beautiful river in the festival area in which you can bathe during the hot weather
info.rite: RITE - if you get tired of the festival or just want to stretch your legs, take a trip to the Saula Blue Springs - have a ritual there and sacrifice something... magical :p
info.market: MARKET - we have a market full of the country's best booze, mouth-watering food, fancy clothes, and hey ‚Äì you can even dye your hair green :p
info.boat: VIKING BOAT - take a trip on a viking boat on a mystical river
info.tentshop:
CAMPING AREA SHOP - the camping area shop (open every day until 22:00) allows you to buy booze with regular shop prices (to be consumed in the camping area, not outside of it).
This is mostly because bringing your own booze to the festival grounds and the camping area is not allowed. However, bringing your own non-alcoholic drinks and food are more than welcome (in the camping area)
info.mc: HAVE FUN WITH THE MC - the Road Devil MC guys will make the festival program even more magical with some cool games and whatnot ‚Äì be ready for suprises!
info.extra: EXTRA keep your eyes open for any spontaneous swordfights, drinking & eating orgies etc. THAT'S WHAT BARBAR FEAST IS ALL ABOUT
